title: HTML Tags & Elements
description: Learn about different HTML tags and how to structure content

steps.title: Step 1: Understanding Elements
steps.content:
An HTML **element** consists of an opening tag, content, and a closing tag. For example: `

This is content

` Some elements are **self-closing** and don't need a closing tag, like `
` (line break) and `` (image).

steps.title: Step 2: Bold and Italic
steps.content:
You can style text using special tags:
- `<strong>` makes text **bold** (important content)
- `<em>` makes text *italic* (emphasized content)

These tags can be nested inside other tags like paragraphs.

steps.title: Step 3: Lists
steps.content:
HTML has two types of lists:
- **Unordered lists** (`<ul>`) with bullet points
- **Ordered lists** (`<ol>`) with numbers

Each item in a list uses the `<li>` (list item) tag.

steps.content:
Great job! You've learned about HTML elements, text formatting, and lists. These are fundamental building blocks for every web page.
